text: Kananjalo wena (Muhammad) wawungekho ngakwicala lentaba yeTûr (intaba yeSinayi) xa Sasibiza6. Ukanti wena uthunyelwe njengenceba evela eNkosini yakho, ukuba unike isilumkiso ebantwini ekungazanga kwabakho mlumkisi uthunyelwayo kubo ngaphambili kunawe: khon’ukuze bakhumbule okanye bafumane ululeko
